description: Killer Bee is a ninja from the village of Kumogakure. He is introduced during Part II as one of the two hosts that have yet to be captured by the criminal organization Akatsuki, the other being series protagonist http://anidb.net/ch226 [Uzumaki Naruto]. The host of the ushi-oni-like http://anidb.net/ch14124 [eight-tailed beast], Killer Bee has complete control over the beast sealed within him. In battle he uses its great strength to increase the lethality of his professional wrestling-styled attacks. He is also a talented swordsman capable of using up to seven swords at once. Killer Bee is the brother of http://anidb.net/ch16171 [Aa], the current Raikage of http://anidb.net/ch12205 [Kumogakure], and as such is expected to be the guardian of the village. When Akatsuki attacks him, he pretends to be captured to escape this job and pursue a career as an enka music singer.
name: Killer Bee
